thread.title: Katy Perry's Backup 'House' Dancer Falls Offstage at Brit Awards (VIDEO + PHOTO)
thread.title_full: Katy Perry's Backup 'House' Dancer Falls Offstage at Brit Awards (VIDEO + PHOTO)

author: TMZ Staff
title: Katy Perry's Backup 'House' Dancer Falls Offstage at Brit Awards (VIDEO + PHOTO)
text:
Katy Perry's Backup 'House' Dancer Falls Offstage at Brit Awards Katy Perry Backup 'House' Dancer Eats it 2/22/2017 1:47 PM PST Breaking News 
Katy Perry might be chained to the rhythm ... but her backup dancer sure wasn't when they fell offstage at the Brit Awards. 
Katy just performed her new song Wednesday in the UK -- joined by Skip Marley -- when a backup dancer took the tumble in his/her house costume. 
The house did not appear damaged.
